data.text:
Published by Random House, 1984

Hardcover

First printing

229 pages

9.5x6 inches

First Random House edition. Book and dust jacket in Very Good condition. Signed by Norman Mailer. Comes in removable protective Brodart mylar cover.

1984 novel by Norman Mailer that was the basis for his 1987 film of the same name.
